title: Kyler Gets His Extension
description:
Domonique Foxworth, Pablo Torre, and Israel Gutierrez debate what James Harden’s new deal means for he and the Sixers' future, if a LIV Golf-style football league would threaten the NFL, if Joe Lacob has a point about the luxury tax being unfair, if Grant Williams is being honest or salty and Kyler Murray’s new contract. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Debatable: What does James Harden's contract mean and Kyler Murray signs an extension.
